ygData.subject: Vampire Embrace Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: Well one  more time, since I received no usefull responses at all- maybe I m not hitting the list right?   The above spell won t do squat for me so it looks
ygData.messageBody:
Well one more time, since I received no usefull responses at all- maybe
I'm not hitting the list right? The above spell won't do squat for me
so it looks like I have no L8 offensive spells at all except for Ward
Undead, leaving me nothing but my pet for real help with non-dead
targets. Can one of you instruct me how to use the VE spell and what to
expect from it? I have cast it with no weapon, etc and all I see is
blue gas and lots of wasted mana! Also where do you direct complaints
for fixes where someone actually sees them and responds? Or is this
like UO where one has little hope of success?
